attributes.action: Put a stop to public bodies which investigate themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop social services, councils, the legal profession, planning departments, and all public bodies from investigating themselves. In cases such as the Planning Inspectorate, and the Councils Ombudsman they are supposed to be independant, but in truth the Chief Executives are scared to "rock the boat" as they fear losing their highly overpaid jobs
